title: CNICS Food Security Questionnaire (FSQ)
description: CNICS Food Security Questionnaire (FSQ). Based on: Young J, Jeganathan S, Houtzager L, Di Guilmi A, Purnomo J. A valid two-item food security questionnaire for screening HIV-1 infected patients in a clinical setting. Public Health Nutr. 2009;12(11):2129-2132.

item.text: Please read the following two statements and indicate whether the statement was OFTEN, SOMETIMES, or NEVER true for you or other members of your household in the last 12 months.
The food I/we bought just didn't last, and I/we didn't have money to get more.
I/we couldn't afford to eat balanced meals.
